verses.verse: וּמֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> u-mo-Sheh, Now Moses הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become רֹעֶ֛ה <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Eh was pasturing אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צֹ֛אן <S%H6629><s%> tzon the flock יִתְר֥וֹ <S%H3503><s%> yit-Ro of Jethro חֹתְנ֖וֹ <S%H2859><s%> cho-te-No his father in law כֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> ko-Hen the priest מִדְיָ֑ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan; of Midian וַיִּנְהַ֤ג <S%H5090><s%> vai-yin-Hag and he led אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַצֹּאן֙ <S%H6629><s%> hatz-tzoN the flock אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> 'a-Char to the backside הַמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Bar, of the desert וַיָּבֹ֛א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> har to the mountain הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God חֹרֵֽבָה׃ <S%H2722><s%> cho-Re-vah. [even] to Horeb

וַ֠יֵּרָא <S%H7200><s%> Vai-ye-ra appeared מַלְאַ֨ךְ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'Ach And the angel יְהֹוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav unto בְּלַבַּת־ <S%H3827><s%> be-lab-bat- unto him in a flame אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh of fire מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch out of the midst הַסְּנֶ֑ה <S%H5572><s%> has-se-Neh; of a bush וַיַּ֗רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar, and he looked וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold הַסְּנֶה֙ <S%H5572><s%> has-se-Neh and behold the bush בֹּעֵ֣ר <S%H1197><s%> bo-'Er burned בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh, with fire וְהַסְּנֶ֖ה <S%H5572><s%> ve-has-se-Neh and the bush אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <S%H369><s%> 'ei-Nen-nu was not אֻכָּֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> 'uk-Kal. [was] not consumed

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses אָסֻֽרָה־ <S%H5493><s%> 'a-su-rah- I will now turn aside נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> na now וְאֶרְאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> ve-'er-'Eh, and see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמַּרְאֶ֥ה <S%H4758><s%> ham-mar-'Eh sight הַגָּדֹ֖ל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol this great הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; this מַדּ֖וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> mad-Du-a' why לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- is not יִבְעַ֥ר <S%H1197><s%> yiv-'Ar is not burnt הַסְּנֶֽה׃ <S%H5572><s%> has-se-Neh. the bush

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And when the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for סָ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> sar that he turned aside לִרְא֑וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot; to see וַיִּקְרָא֩ <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called אֵלָ֨יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch unto him out of the midst הַסְּנֶ֗ה <S%H5572><s%> has-se-Neh, of the bush וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Ne-ni. Here

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּקְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> tik-Rav Draw not nigh הֲלֹ֑ם <S%H1988><s%> ha-Lom; hither שַׁל־ <S%H5394><s%> shal- put off נְעָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5275><s%> ne-'a-Lei-cha thy shoes מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from רַגְלֶ֔יךָ <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lei-cha, from off thy feet כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הַמָּק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom, for the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whereon אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you עוֹמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> o-Med thou standest עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, and אַדְמַת־ <S%H127><s%> 'ad-mat- ground קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh [is] holy הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. He

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, Moreover he said אָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei I [am] the God אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha, of thy father אֱלֹהֵ֧י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the God אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham of Abraham אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak of Isaac וֵאלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> ve-lo-Hei and the God יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko; of Jacob וַיַּסְתֵּ֤ר <S%H5641><s%> vai-yas-Ter hid מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses פָּנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav, his face כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יָרֵ֔א <S%H3372><s%> ya-Re, for he was afraid מֵהַבִּ֖יט <S%H5027><s%> me-hab-Bit to look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- at הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him. upon God

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, And the LORD רָאֹ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> ra-'Oh I have surely רָאִ֛יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֳנִ֥י <S%H6040><s%> 'o-Ni the affliction עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi of my people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> be-mitz-Ra-yim; which [are] in Egypt וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et צַעֲקָתָ֤ם <S%H6818><s%> tza-'a-ka-Tam their cry שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-ti and have heard מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei by reason נֹֽגְשָׂ֔יו <S%H5065><s%> no-ge-Sav, of their taskmasters כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יָדַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti for I know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַכְאֹבָֽיו׃ <S%H4341><s%> mach-'o-Vav. their sorrows

וָאֵרֵ֞ד <S%H3381><s%> va-'e-Red And I am come down לְהַצִּיל֣וֹ׀ <S%H5337><s%> le-hatz-tzi-Lo to deliver מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad them out of the hand מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, Egyptian וּֽלְהַעֲלֹתוֹ֮ <S%H5927><s%> u-le-ha-'a-lo-To and to bring מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- that הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz them up out of that land הַהִוא֒ <S%H1931><s%> ha-hi-V he אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz land טוֹבָה֙ <S%H2896><s%> to-Vah unto a good וּרְחָבָ֔ה <S%H7342><s%> u-re-cha-Vah, and a large אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz unto a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> za-Vat flowing חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבָ֑שׁ <S%H1706><s%> u-de-Vash; and honey אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מְק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> me-Kom unto the place הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni of the Canaanites וְהַ֣חִתִּ֔י <S%H2850><s%> ve-Ha-chit-Ti, and the Hittites וְהָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <S%H567><s%> ve-ha-'e-mo-Ri and the Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <S%H6522><s%> ve-hap-pe-riz-Zi, and the Perizzites וְהַחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> ve-ha-chiv-Vi and the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <S%H2983><s%> ve-hay-vu-Si. and the Jebusites

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold צַעֲקַ֥ת <S%H6818><s%> tza-'a-Kat Now therefore behold the cry בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בָּ֣אָה <S%H935><s%> Ba-'ah is come אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; to me וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- furthermore רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti unto me and I have also seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַלַּ֔חַץ <S%H3906><s%> hal-La-chatz, the oppression אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian לֹחֲצִ֥ים <S%H3905><s%> lo-cha-Tzim oppress אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam.

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now לְכָ֔ה <S%H1980><s%> le-Chah, come וְאֶֽשְׁלָחֲךָ֖ <S%H7971><s%> ve-'esh-la-cha-Cha now therefore and I will send אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh; thee unto Pharaoh וְהוֹצֵ֛א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-Tze that thou mayest bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi my people בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim. out of Egypt

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, unto God מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who אָנֹ֔כִי <S%H595><s%> 'a-No-chi, I כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki should אֵלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> 'e-Lech go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh; unto Pharaoh וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ve-Chi should אוֹצִ֛יא <S%H3318><s%> o-Tzi and that I should bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim. Egypt

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- unto thee that אֶֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> 'eh-Yeh become עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach, you וְזֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> ve-zeh- and this לְּךָ֣ le-Cha הָא֔וֹת <S%H226><s%> ha-'ot, Certainly I will be with thee and this [shall be] a token כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki Certainly אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi is i שְׁלַחְתִּ֑יךָ <S%H7971><s%> she-lach-Ti-cha; I have sent בְּהוֹצִֽיאֲךָ֤ <S%H3318><s%> be-ho-tzi-'a-Cha thee When thou hast brought forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, out of Egypt תַּֽעַבְדוּן֙ <S%H5647><s%> ta-'av-Dun ye shall serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, God עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al and הָהָ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har upon this mountain הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָֽאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, unto God הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I בָא֮ <S%H935><s%> va Behold [when] I come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְאָמַרְתִּ֣י <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ti and shall say לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei unto them The God אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-tei-Chem of your fathers שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <S%H7971><s%> she-la-Cha-ni hath sent אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem; to וְאָֽמְרוּ־ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-me-ru- me unto you and they shall say לִ֣י li מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What שְּׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo, to me מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> mah What אֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'o-Mar say אֲלֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem. about
